body_html: I have the same issue, I have an implementation in torch, that the input is a 4D tensor. But now I am trying to implement in pyTorch, and it gives me an error saying it only allows a 2D tensor. What else can I do to solve this problem before it gets fixed?

body: I have the same issue, I have an implementation in torch, that the input is a 4D tensor. But now I am trying to implement in pyTorch, and it gives me an error saying it only allows a 2D tensor. What else can I do to solve this problem before it gets fixed?
